item.title: Hostnames With Unifi Networks
item.description: For what has seemed like months I’d been plagued with rogue hostnames hitting my network devices and I’d struggled to track it down…until today. I was putting together a really hacky solution to a weird problem ages ago and set a hostname on a Raspberry Pi to be its IP address concatenated with the device name.
